00043 class CSwordModuleInfo : public CModuleInfo  {
00044 public: 
00049   enum unlockErrorCode {
00050         noError,    /* No error occured, everything worked ok. The key was written to the config*/
00051         wrongUnlockKey, /* The wrong key was used. Module is not unlocked */                
00052         notLocked, /* The module was not locked so it can't be unlocked */
00053         noPermission /* The key was not written to config because we have no permissions*/
00054     };
00055     
00059     CSwordModuleInfo( CSwordBackend* backend, SWModule* module );
00063     virtual ~CSwordModuleInfo();    
00067   CSwordBackend* backend();
00071   SWModule* module();
00076   unlockErrorCode unlock( const QString unlockKey );

00100   bool isLocked() const;
